newsitem.title: USA: U.S T-bond drops over a point on hawkish Greenspan.
newsitem.headline: U.S T-bond drops over a point on hawkish Greenspan.

text.p: U.S. Treasury prices fell sharply on Wednesday when Federal Reserve Chairman Alan Greenspan's Humphrey-Hawkins Congressional testimony turned out to be more hawkish than had been expected, analysts said.
The 6-1/2 percent benchmark 30-year bond fell about 1-1/4 point when headlines on the testimony were released. At 1015 EST/1515 GMT, the bond was down a full point to 98-19/32, yielding 6.73 percent.
